snippet.title: Griftlands trailer - PC Gaming Show 2019
snippet.description:
First announced at the PC Gaming Show 2017, Griftlands is a gorgeous RPG with a card-based battle system.

The alpha starts this July, find out more here: https://www.pcgamer.com/griftlands-alpha-trailer/
